name: Jin
imageAlt: Jin, tattoo artist at Diablo Tattoo
bio:
Jin is a highly experienced tattoo artist with 25 years in the industry, known for his precision, creativity, and dedication to the craft. Having co-owned a successful tattoo studio in Essex, he has built a strong reputation for delivering exceptional work across a wide range of styles. While he is versatile in all forms of tattooing, Jin is particularly passionate about horror realism, where his mastery of detail and atmosphere truly stands out.

Beyond tattooing, Jin is a multi-disciplinary artist who enjoys sculpting, painting, and drawing, constantly expanding his creative skillset. His artistic expertise has also led him to work on numerous special-effects projects, further showcasing his ability to bring imaginative concepts to life.

A lover of dark aesthetics and cult classics, Jin's favourite film is House of 1000 Corpses. When he's not creating art, he can often be found enjoying his favourite mealâ€”Wagyu steak.
